mutants.original_line: count = 0
mutants.mutated_line: count = 1
mutants.code:
def calculate_infected_range(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, positions) = case
        final_array = []
        count = 1
        for i in range(N):
            count += 1
            if i < N - 1 and positions[i + 1] - positions[i] > 2:
                final_array.append(count)
                count = 0
        final_array.append(count)
        results.append((min(final_array), max(final_array)))
    return results
